column4: Is there any way to enumerate samba shares and rights on linux?
look up what shares are available for me to write to and read from
I've never needed to do so - not for a long time, but you could try: smbclient -L computername
Yea, but I need to do it for about 70 - 100 computers
Try looking for an smb browser or something, try apt-cache browse | grep smb or something
